shortdesc.ph: Allows a user to join a channel.
Allows a user to join a channel.

section.note: Once the user joins the channel, the user subscribes to the audio and video streams of all the other users in the channel by default, giving rise to usage and billing calculation. Once the user joins the channel, the user subscribes to the audio and video streams of all the other users in the channel by default, giving rise to usage and billing calculation. If you do not want to subscribe to a specified stream or all remote streams, call the mute methods accordingly. If you do not want to subscribe to a specified stream or all remote streams, call the mute methods accordingly.
